common_query.common: SELECT R.*, PR.PRINCIPAL FROM (SELECT REQ.UUID UUID, REQ.PURCHASE_REQ_NO PURCHASE_REQ_NO, REQ.STATE STATE, SCODE.CODE_DESC STATE_NM, REQ.REMARK REMARK, REQ.COMPANY_CODE COMPANY_CODE, REQ.DEPARTMENT_CODE DEPARTMENT_CODE, REQ.SUBJECT_CODE SUBJECT_CODE, NVL(ORG.ORG_NAME, '') ORG_NAME, NVL(SUB.FINANCIAL_SUBJECT, '') FINANCIAL_SUBJECT, NVL(SUB.SUBJECT_CODE, '') FINANCIAL_SUBJECT_CODE, REQ.CREATE_BY CREATE_BY, REQ.CREATE_TIME CREATE_TIME, REQ.UPDATE_BY UPDATE_BY, REQ.UPDATE_TIME UPDATE_TIME, REQ.TBL_VERSION TBL_VERSION, REQ.IS_VOID IS_VOID, REQ.SEQ_NO SEQ_NO, REQ.OFFICE_ID OFFICE_ID, REQ.IS_PROJECT IS_PROJECT, REQ.PURCHASE_LEVEL PURCHASE_LEVEL, SCODE2.CODE_DESC PURCHASE_LEVEL_NAME, SUB.REMAIN_BUDGET REMAIN_MONEY, TMP.TOTAL_EXPECTED_PRICE TOTAL_EXPECTED_PRICE, U.USER_NAME, DETAIL.SNAME FROM PRM_PURCHASE_REQ REQ, SCDP_CODE SCODE, SCDP_ORG ORG, SCDP_CODE SCODE2, SCDP_USER U, VW_NON_BUDGET_EXECUTE SUB, (SELECT RD.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID, NVL(SUM(RD.AMOUNT * RD.EXPECTED_PRICE), 0) TOTAL_EXPECTED_PRICE FROM PRM_PURCHASE_REQ REQ, PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_DETAIL RD WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQ.UUID = RD.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID AND (RD.ISFALLBACK IS NULL OR RD.ISFALLBACK <> '1') AND ${selfconditions} GROUP BY RD.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID) TMP, (SELECT S.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID, S.NAME || 'ç­‰' AS SNAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID ORDER BY D.PURCHASE_BUDGET_MONEY DESC) RN, D.* FROM PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_DETAIL D) S WHERE RN = 1) DETAIL WHERE SCODE.CODE_TYPE(+) = 'CDM_BILL_STATE' AND REQ.STATE = SCODE.SYS_CODE(+) AND SCODE2.CODE_TYPE(+) = 'PRM_PURCHASE_LEVEL' AND REQ.PURCHASE_LEVEL = SCODE2.SYS_CODE(+) AND REQ.DEPARTMENT_CODE = ORG.ORG_CODE(+) AND REQ.IS_PROJECT = '0' AND (REQ.IS_VOID='0' OR REQ.IS_VOID IS NULL) AND REQ.CREATE_BY = U.USER_ID(+) AND REQ.UUID = TMP.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID(+) AND REQ.BUGDET_ID = SUB.UUID(+) AND ${selfconditions2} AND REQ.UUID = DETAIL.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID(+) AND ${selfconditions}) R LEFT JOIN (SELECT PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID, LISTAGG(USER_NAME, ';') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID) AS PRINCIPAL FROM (SELECT DISTINCT SU.USER_NAME, SPR.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID FROM SCM_PURCHASE_REQ SPR LEFT JOIN SCDP_USER SU ON SU.USER_ID = SPR.PRINCIPAL) GROUP BY PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID) PR ON PR.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID = R.UUID

nonproject_budget_query.common: SELECT CD.* , (CD.AMOUNT - NVL(REQD.APPLIEDAMOUNT,0)) REMAIN_AMOUNT , (CD.AMOUNT - NVL(REQD.APPLIEDAMOUNT,0)) * NVL(CD.PRICE,0) REMAIN_PRICE FROM NON_PROJECT_BUDGET_C_D CD ,(SELECT REQ.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID ,SUM(DECODE(NVL(CON.UUID, '') ,'',REQ.AMOUNT,REQ.HANDLE_AMOUNT) ) APPLIEDAMOUNT ,SUM(DECODE(NVL(CON.UUID, '') ,'',NVL(REQ.AMOUNT,0),NVL(REQ.HANDLE_AMOUNT,0)) * NVL(REQ.EXPECTED_PRICE, 0)) APPLIEDPRICE FROM PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_DETAIL REQ ,PRM_PURCHASE_REQ RH ,SCM_CONTRACT CON WHERE RH.STATE IN('1','2','9') AND RH.UUID = REQ.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID AND (REQ.ISFALLBACK IS NULL OR REQ.ISFALLBACK <> '1') AND REQ.SCM_CONTRACT_ID = CON.UUID(+) AND CON.STATE(+) = '2' GROUP BY REQ.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID ) REQD WHERE ${conditions} and ${voidfilter} AND CD.UUID = REQD.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID(+)

query_load_reqdetail.common: SELECT REQ.* ,(CD.AMOUNT - NVL(REQD.APPLIEDAMOUNT, 0)) REMAIN_AMOUNT ,(CD.AMOUNT - NVL(REQD.APPLIEDAMOUNT, 0)) * NVL(PRICE,0) REMAIN_PRICE ,PRICE PRICE ,SC.CODE_DESC CONTRACT_STATE ,U.USER_NAME UNDERTAKER FROM NON_PROJECT_BUDGET_C_D CD ,( SELECT REQ.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID ,SUM(DECODE(NVL(CON.UUID, ''),'',REQ.AMOUNT,REQ.HANDLE_AMOUNT)) APPLIEDAMOUNT ,SUM(DECODE(NVL(CON.UUID, ''),'',NVL(REQ.AMOUNT, 0),NVL(REQ.HANDLE_AMOUNT, 0)) * NVL(REQ.EXPECTED_PRICE, 0)) APPLIEDPRICE FROM PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_DETAIL REQ ,PRM_PURCHASE_REQ RH ,SCM_CONTRACT CON WHERE RH.STATE IN('1','2','9') AND RH.UUID = REQ.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID AND REQ.SCM_CONTRACT_ID = CON.UUID(+) AND CON.STATE(+) = '2' AND (REQ.ISFALLBACK IS NULL OR REQ.ISFALLBACK <> '1') AND REQ.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID IN( SELECT PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID FROM PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_DETAIL WHERE PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID = '${qryCondition}') GROUP BY REQ.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID ) REQD ,PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_DETAIL REQ ,SCM_CONTRACT CON ,SCDP_CODE SC ,SCDP_USER U WHERE REQ.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID = CD.UUID(+) AND REQ.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID = REQD.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID(+) AND REQ.SCM_CONTRACT_ID = CON.UUID(+) AND CON.CREATE_BY = U.USER_ID(+) AND CON.CONTRACT_STATE = SC.SYS_CODE(+) AND SC.CODE_TYPE(+) = 'SCM_CONTRACT_STATE' AND REQ.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID = '${qryCondition}'

query_check_fixed_assets.common:
SELECT RSLT.TOTAL - NVL(CD.REMAIN_BUDGET,0) REMAIN FROM VW_NON_BUDGET_EXECUTE CD ,(SELECT TMP.BUGDET_ID, SUM(TMP.SUBTOTAL) TOTAL FROM ( SELECT RH.BUGDET_ID,RD.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID CD_UUID ,SUM(DECODE(NVL(CON.UUID, ''),'',NVL(RD.AMOUNT, 0),NVL(RD.HANDLE_AMOUNT, 0)) * NVL(RD.EXPECTED_PRICE, 0)) SUBTOTAL FROM PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_DETAIL RD ,PRM_PURCHASE_REQ RH ,SCM_CONTRACT CON WHERE 1 = 1 AND RH.UUID = RD.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID AND RD.SCM_CONTRACT_ID = CON.UUID(+) AND CON.STATE(+) = '2' AND (RD.ISFALLBACK IS NULL OR RD.ISFALLBACK <> '1') AND RD.PRM_PURCHASE_REQ_ID = '${qryCondition}'
GROUP BY RD.PURCHASE_PACKAGE_ID, RH.BUGDET_ID ) TMP GROUP BY TMP.BUGDET_ID ) RSLT WHERE RSLT.BUGDET_ID = CD.UUID
